sourcesContent:
import { useParams, Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGetFlightByIdQuery } from "../../redux/api/flightApi"; import Header from "../Header"; import Footer from "../Footer"; export default function FlightDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); const location = useLocation(); const query = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const from = query.get("from"); const to = query.get("to"); const pax = query.get("pax"); const { data, error, isLoading } = useGetFlightByIdQuery({ id, from, to, pax, }); console.log("Flight Detail Data:", data); if (isLoading) return
Loading...
; if (error) return
Error loading flight details
; const flight = data?.flight; const fromAirport = data?.fromAirport; const toAirport = data?.toAirport; if (!flight) return
Flight not found
; const handleEnquiryClick = () => { navigate( `/enquiry?flightId=${id}&from=${from}&to=${to}&pax=${pax}&date=${travelDate}&time=${travelTime}&remarks=${ remarks || "" }` ); }; return ( <>

Flight Details

{/* ====== Left Section ====== */}

{flight.name}

  • {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
  • {new Date().toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", })}
  • {pax} Passengers
Speed

{flight.maxSpeed} km/hr

Passengers

{flight.capacity} Person

Travel Time

{flight.travelTime} min

Luggage

{flight.baggage || "N/A"} kg

Mandatory Guidelines for all travellers

Please arrive 30 minutes before departure. Carry a valid government ID. Ensure baggage does not exceed allowed limit.

{/* ====== Right Section ====== */}

Ride Details

{fromAirport?.name} - {toAirport?.name}

location_on

{fromAirport?.name}, {fromAirport?.city},{" "} {fromAirport?.country}

location_on

{toAirport?.name}, {toAirport?.city},{" "} {toAirport?.country}

Distance

location_on

Total Distance: {flight.distance} KM

schedule

Total Duration:{" "} {Math.floor(flight.travelTime / 60)} hr{" "} {flight.travelTime % 60} min

Bill Details

Base Fare
currency_rupee {" "} {flight.price?.toLocaleString()}
Taxes & Fees
currency_rupee {" "} {Math.round((flight.price || 0) * 0.12).toLocaleString()}
Grand Total
currency_rupee {" "} {Math.round((flight.price || 0) * 1.12).toLocaleString()}
{/*
Back
*/}
); }
